segments.text: I see the boy stretching for the cookie jar, completely ignoring the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, but he doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her turn, not even looking at the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to be really upset when she sees the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still running, and it’s getting everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone is going to stop this before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
